description:
This truly unique violin video course is shot with two cameras by a professional video agency. You will see in detail the finger positions and the overal body technics to make sure you learn how to play the violin the right way. Some exercises are guided by simple music notes to help you on your way. You learn how to play Pizzicato and how to get this amazing vibrato sound. If you start this English spoken violin course today you will be able to play your first songs in no-time.

This violin course experience simulates everything about basic technics you could learn from a teacher standing next to you.


This course is for you if:

  • You are a violin newbie.
  • If you want to refresh your technics.


General course information

  • Professional camera crew and video editing, made by a professional video production agency.
  • Two camera shots when relevant.
  • Experienced and patience teacher.
  • Basics explained in uttermost detail.
  • To the point technical instructions.
  • Unbelievable low price making it accessible for students all over the world.
title: Violin lessons for beginners
